Package lib.homies.framework.minigame

Class AbstractMiniGame

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.minigame.AbstractMiniGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
MiniGame
public abstract class AbstractMiniGame extends Object implements MiniGame
An abstract base class for creating MiniGame implementations. This class provides common functionality for managing players, game state, and basic lifecycle methods. Subclasses should implement the abstract methods to define specific game logic.

    • start

      public final void start()
      Starts the minigame. Transitions the state to MiniGameState.STARTING then MiniGameState.RUNNING. Calls the abstract onStart() method for subclass-specific logic.
      Specified by:
      start in interface MiniGame

    • stop

      public final void stop()
      Stops the minigame. Transitions the state to MiniGameState.ENDING then MiniGameState.STOPPED. Calls the abstract onStop() method for subclass-specific logic.
      Specified by:
      stop in interface MiniGame

    • addPlayer

      public final void addPlayer(HomiesPlayer player)
      Adds a player to the minigame. Calls the abstract onPlayerJoin(HomiesPlayer) method for subclass-specific logic.
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in interface MiniGame
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to add.

    • removePlayer

      public final void removePlayer(HomiesPlayer player)
      Removes a player from the minigame. Calls the abstract onPlayerLeave(HomiesPlayer) method for subclass-specific logic.
      Specified by:
      removePlayer in interface MiniGame
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to remove.

    • onStart

      protected abstract void onStart()
      Called when the minigame is starting. Subclasses should implement their game-specific startup logic here.

    • onStop

      protected abstract void onStop()
      Called when the minigame is stopping. Subclasses should implement their game-specific cleanup logic here.

    • onPlayerJoin

      protected abstract void onPlayerJoin(HomiesPlayer player)
      Called when a player joins the minigame. Subclasses can implement logic like teleporting the player, giving kits, etc.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who joined.

    • onPlayerLeave

      protected abstract void onPlayerLeave(HomiesPlayer player)
      Called when a player leaves the minigame. Subclasses can implement logic like removing the player from the game area, resetting their state, etc.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who left.
